features: HARDCOVER NOTEBOOK – 6 Pack A5 size lined pages hardcover notebooks. Premium PU makes durable and sturdy covers to keep your journal safe for years. Vibrant color hardcover journals for writing, office supplies, school supplies, home and travel.

EXCELLENT VALUE – Wide-ruled notebook made of excellent quality cover, which is comfortable to touch. The sturdy casing keeps the inner paper from deforming and wrinkling, ensuring your notebook to last for years. Easy to carry size 8.3 x 5.7 Inches,192 Pages/ 96 Sheets for long lasting writing.

PROFESSIONAL QUALITY – Upgraded 100 GSM off-white paper, which helps write smoothly without ghosting, smearing and avoid eyes tiredness. No Bleeding through for most ink pen. Classic A5 notebooks with sturdy pen holder and ribbon bookmark.

WIDE USES – Lined Journal notebook is perfect for gifts and suitable for business, executives, students, adults, scientists. It also can be applied as a travel journal, business notebook, college course notebook, many fields of work, daily diary and memo.

SATISFACTORY SERVICE - We are committed to providing you with the high-quality journal notebook and the most trustworthy service with a wonderful writing experience. 6pack college ruled hardcover notebooks, thoughtful gifts for friends and family. Handy notebooks perfect to record everything in your daily life.

Touched comfortably, sturdy hard cover protects your notes for years. Lined notebook adopts 100GSM quality paper, thick than normal, you can use confidently most of the pen, pencil colored pens, oil pens and mark. 6 pack with six classic color covers with Acid-free paper can be flat to 180 degree, perfect for note taking, diary, journal writing and more. As journal notebook bulk, business notebook, teen journals. A special gift you can share with your friends or family. Perfect for Christmas gift, back to school gift, New Year gifts or Birthday presents. 6 Pack notebook bulk ideal for School Supplies, Office Supplies. Principal Lines committed to offering great journals and confident for you will love our notebooks.

PREMIUM PAPER Made with high-quality, 100 GSM acid-free paper in light ivory color, our journal paper is thicker than average notebooks & writing pads, so you can confidently use most pens, pencils, great for writing with less chance of ink bleed through. WIDE USES Hardcover Journal notebook is suitable for business, students, adults, scientists and many fields of work and study. It also can be applied as a travel journal, business notebook, college course notebook, diary, daily planner, memo and more. VIBRANT COLORS COVER 6 Pack Lined Writing Journal Bulk uses 6 different and vibrant colors for the cover, premium leather hard cover looks sumptuous and touch comfortable. Hardcover can be written at any time with smooth writing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, good price
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I expected - good quality journals for a good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Journals for Journaling, Taking Notes, Etc.
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of purchasing these journals because they were so cheap, but I decided to go ahead with the purchase and return them later if I didn't like them. Needless to say, I was NOT disappointed. I love the layout of the pages. The pages are nice and thick enough that the pens I like to use don't bleed through. The paper is smooth and easy to write on. I would buy these again and again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Value for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I’m sort of in a dilemma here, and I hope that the manufacturer can straighten this out for me.In the title of this item, it is described as a “Hardcover PU Leather Notebook,” which means that it is made from polyurethane plastic. It then states under “Cover Material: Leather.” Under “About this item,” it states again in several spots that the cover is made from PU leather or vegan leather. Scroll down further to the comparison table, and it lists “A5 PU leather cover.” Finally, under the product information, “Technical Details,” it lists the cover material as “Leather.”Call me crazy, but I swear the notebook covers have a hint of smelling like real leather to me. Nowhere on the product’s packaging or labeling does it state that it’s PU leather or vegan leather. It just says in bold, red letters “Leather” Hardcover.With all of the inconsistencies in the item’s description and packaging, I’m not sure if it’s real leather or not. Just wanted to give a heads-up in case you are Vegan that these notebook covers may be made out of the real deal.Despite the confusion described up above, these notebooks are definitely an upgrade from the composition books that I have been using to journal in. The pages inside are very good quality, acid-free, and thicker than I’m used to. I enjoy using a variety of pens while journaling, from ballpoint, Flair pens, highlighters, gel pens, and even ultra fine-point Sharpies that range in different colors and thickness with no bleed through. I really like the weather/day/memo number/date graphics at the top which you can choose to use or not. Each notebook also comes with a ribbon placeholder, an elastic loop to hold a pen, and an elastic band to keep the notebook closed. Very good value for the price, especially if it’s real leather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Notebooks at a Reasonable Price
reviews.reviewText: If you need a large quantity of notebooks for handouts or meetings or for students, this pack of notebooks is a good choice. The size and quality of the notebook is very good with sturdy covers and the weight of the paper is good, not too thin. The covers are very smooth and feel nice. I like the cream color paper and the wide lines. Each page has headings for the day of the week, date and numbering. These are not college ruled notebooks. The bright colors are fun, too, for variety. The elastics for the pen and to close the notebook are attached well. If you are looking for a fine quality leather notebook with perfect stitching on the covers, this is not the set for you. But for about $4 per notebook, you can't go wrong if you need to order many for a group purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set for business or personal
reviews.reviewText: This set of notebooks is a great deal, perfect for gifts, swag bags, or for your office. There are 12 notebooks, two in each color. Each notebook has a matching elastic to hold the book closed, plus a matching elastic pen loop so you’ll never be without a writing instrument. There is no branding or logo of any kind on the notebook exterior.The pages are a pleasant ecru color, and the lines are comfortably wide. The top of each page has boxes to indicate the day’s weather, the day of the week, and the date. There is also a line for “memo number”, which I suppose you could use to number the pages.There’s no identification page at the front of the notebook, no index, and no pocket at the back cover.These notebooks would make a great personal daily journal, a gratitude journal, or a daily record of your workday. Definitely a good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and Lovely Notebooks; "Leather" Labelling Misleading
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful! At current pricing, they are less than $4 per journal, which is a good value. The colors are vibrant and cute. The covers are smooth and feel a bit like moleskine journals. Inside the journal is a ribbon one can use for bookmarking. The top of the pages are set up so that one could make these a daily diary or planner, or these could be used for general journaling. As someone who doesn't need to write things down every day, it's nice to be able to fill in the dates as I go. The pages are fairly thick and feel substantial, so ink wouldn't spill through. The pages are wide-ruled rather than college-ruled. This spacing isn't my personal favorite, but at this price I'd certainly order these again. They'll last me for years! I divided them in half to share with my partner...6 each will still last and last!4 stars instead of 5: Some sections of the Amazon listing state that this is "PU Leather", aka plastic, but most of the labeling implies that these are genuine leather journals. One cannot call plastic leather in truthful advertising. That said, I prefer non-leather notebooks as I'm vegetarian, so I take this as a GOOD thing. I just cannot give misleading labeling a 5 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick paper, six different colors
reviews.reviewText: These memo books are small enough to carry around and are a pleasure to write in. There are six different colors in the box of 12 books - two of each color. Each book comes with a marker ribbon and a pen holder. The pen holder is a little large for my cheap ball point pen - perhaps a thicker pen is in order. On the top of each page is a place to note the day and date along with some weather condition icons (pictured). The books are perfect for needs - they are large enough to write in, but still portable and can even be color-coded by topic!
